trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Chesterton
There were no other sightings in Chesterton on or around May 16th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsme and my girlfriend where on ower whay to see the new star trek. at the portage imax. we where going west on 1100. i first saw it when we reached 1100 and merridian. through the trees i seen blinking lights and it looked odd. further down the rode less than a half mile.when no more trees were in the way i could see two sepperat blue long lights flashing next to each other. i was on the passeger side. they where hovering over porter cove. when we were parallel with it it dissapered. all i can sayis that it wasent a plane or helicoptor. or anything else. i take ufos verey seriously and thats that.
Summary: {nd} two long cylindrcal light flashing in the sky low altitude
